remarks: A constructed pre-Hilbert space is a structure.  Starting from ~ lmodstr (which has 4 members), we chain ~ strleun once more, adding an ordered pair to the function, to get all 5 members.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
statement:
phlfn.h $e |- H = ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. , <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , T >. } u. { <. ( .s ` ndx ) , .x. >. , <. ( .i ` ndx ) , ., >. } ) $.
phlstr $p |- H Struct <. 1 , 8 >. $.
